wikipedia_page.main: Jardine Bell Whyte (5 March 1880 – 8 July 1954) was a British consulting engineer and naval architect, who later served a single term in Parliament as a Conservative. He was generally loyal to the National Government but pressed for stronger defence and the use of modern engineering to help society.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1931 United Kingdom general election

response: *Jardine Whyte; MP for North East Derbyshire (1931–1935)
